about_the_game:
From the darkest depths of space, Commander Katrina Hush Gareth and her trusty Bionic flagship USS Pensacola are ready to de-orbit and enter the fray on the seas of World of Warships. This sci-fi themed DLC includes 3-skill-point space Commander Katrina Hush Gareth and American cruiser Pensacola equipped with the Bionic permanent camouflage.

The Bionic permanent camouflage not only changes the appearance of your ship to look like a futuristic spacecraft, but also includes unique visual and sound effects for her guns and various other actions.

This package contains:
  • Tier VI researchable American cruiser Pensacola equipped with the sci-fi-themed Bionic permanent camouflage
  • American Commander Katrina Hush Gareth with 3 skill points
  • 3 days of Warships Premium Account
  • The Space Station patch symbol

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

This sci-fi themed DLC includes 3-skill-point space Commander Katrina Hush Gareth and American cruiser Pensacola equipped with the Bionic permanent camouflage.

The Bionic permanent camouflage not only changes the appearance of your ship to look like a futuristic spacecraft, but also includes unique visual and sound effects for her guns and various other actions.

This package contains:

short_description: Ever fantasized about taking on a fleet of 20th-century warships from the bridge of a sleek sci-fi spacecraft? Now you can with space Commander Katrina Hush Gareth and her flagship Pensacola with the Bionic permanent camouflage.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
